1.name: The Outsiders
1.description: The rivalry between two gangs, the poor Greasers and the rich Socs, only heats up when one gang member kills a member of the other.

2.name: Risky Business
2.description: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.

3.name: Scarface
3.description: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

4.name: National Lampoon's Vacation
4.description: The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.

5.name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
5.description: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

6.name: WarGames
6.description: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.

7.name: Trading Places
7.description: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

8.name: Flashdance
8.description: A Pittsburgh woman with two jobs as a welder and an exotic dancer wants to get into ballet school.

9.name: The Right Stuff
9.description: The story of the original Mercury 7 astronauts and their macho, seat-of-the-pants approach to the space program.

10.name: Terms of Endearment
10.description: Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love, and her daughter's family problems.

11.name: Videodrome
11.description: When he acquires a different kind of show for his station, a sleazy cable-TV programmer begins to see his life and the future of media spin out of control in a terrifying new reality.

12.name: Christine
12.description: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

13.name: Sleepaway Camp
13.description: Angela Baker, a traumatized and very shy young girl, is sent to summer camp with her cousin. Shortly after her arrival, anyone with sinister or less than honorable intentions gets their comeuppance.

14.name: The Big Chill
14.description: A group of seven former college friends gather for a week-end reunion at a South Carolina vacation home after the funeral of another of their college friends.

15.name: Octopussy
15.description: A fake Fabergé egg, and a fellow Agent's death, lead James Bond to uncover an international jewel-smuggling operation, headed by the mysterious Octopussy, being used to disguise a nuclear attack on N.A.T.O. forces.

16.name: Twilight Zone: The Movie
16.description: Four horror and science fiction segments, directed by four famous directors, each of them being a new version of a classic story from Rod Serling's landmark television series.

17.name: The Dead Zone
17.description: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.

18.name: Never Say Never Again
18.description: A S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.

19.name: Superman III
19.description: Synthetic kryptonite laced with tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

20.name: Krull
20.description: A prince and a fellowship of companions set out to rescue his bride from a fortress of alien invaders who have arrived on their home planet.

21.name: A Christmas Story
21.description: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie attempts to convince his parents, his teacher and Santa that a Red Ryder BB gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

22.name: Rumble Fish
22.description: Rusty James, an absent-minded street thug struggles to live up to his legendary older brother's reputation, and longs for the days when gang warfare was going on.

23.name: Cujo
23.description: Cujo, a friendly St. Bernard, contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.

24.name: The Hunger
24.description: A love triangle develops between a beautiful yet dangerous vampire, her cellist companion, and a gerontologist.

25.name: Private School
25.description: Christine (Phoebe Cates), a student at an exclusive all-girls private school, is in love with Jim, who attends an academy for boys nearby. Christine's arch rival Jordan also has her eye on ...                See full summary »

26.name: Yentl
26.description: A Jewish girl disguises herself as a boy to enter religious training.

27.name: Psycho II
27.description: After twenty-two years of psychiatric care, Norman Bates attempts to return to a life of solitude, but the specters of his crimes - and his mother - continue to haunt him.

28.name: Valley Girl
28.description: Julie, a girl from the valley, meets Randy, a punk from the city. They are from different worlds and find love. Somehow they need to stay together in spite of her trendy, shallow friends.

29.name: The Meaning of Life
29.description: The comedy team takes a look at life in all its stages in their own uniquely silly way.

30.name: Suburbia
30.description: When household tensions and a sense of worthlessness overcome Evan, he finds escape when he clings with the orphans of a throw-away society.

31.name: Deathstalker
31.description: The warrior Deathstalker is sent by a witch on a quest to find a chalice, an amulet, and a sword, two of which are held by the wicked sorcerer Munkar.

32.name: Staying Alive
32.description: Five years later, Tony Manero's Saturday Night Fever is still burning. Now he's strutting toward his biggest challenge yet: succeeding as a dancer on the Broadway stage.

33.name: My Tutor
33.description: A rich father hires a tutor for his son. The son is a horny teenager and the tutor is a gorgeous blonde. Complications ensue.

34.name: The Adventures of Bob & Doug McKenzie: Strange Brew
34.description: Canada's most famous hosers, Bob and Doug McKenzie, get jobs at the Elsinore Brewery, only to learn that something is rotten with the state of it.

35.name: Nostalgia
35.description: A Russian poet and his interpreter travel to Italy to research the life of an 18th-century composer.

36.name: Fire and Ice
36.description: At the end of the ice age, an evil queen and her son are set on conquering the world using magic and warriors. The lone survivor of a crushed village fights back as does the king of Fire Keep.

37.name: Class
37.description: A young man in private school spends one crazy night out, but soon realizes the woman he hooked up with is not who he expected.

38.name: All the Right Moves
38.description: A high school football player desperate for a scholarship and his headstrong coach clash in a dying Pennsylvania steel town.

39.name: Curse of the Pink Panther
39.description: Ensuing after the events of Clouseau's disappearance, his bosses at the Surete put a computer into service to elect a new shrewd detective, Sleigh, who turns up just as inept as Clouseau.

40.name: Silkwood
40.description: A worker at a plutonium processing plant is purposefully contaminated, psychologically tortured and possibly murdered to prevent her from exposing worker safety violations at the plant.

41.name: Bad Boys
41.description: Chicago crime kid Mick O'Brien is sent to reform school after accidentally killing a rival's kid brother.

42.name: Jaws 3-D
42.description: A giant thirty-five-foot shark becomes trapped in a SeaWorld theme park and it's up to the sons of police chief Brody to rescue everyone.

43.name: Something Wicked This Way Comes
43.description: In a small American town, a diabolical circus and its demonic proprietor prey on the townsfolk.

44.name: Local Hero
44.description: An American oil company sends a man to Scotland to buy up an entire village where they want to build a refinery. But things don't go as expected.

45.name: Sudden Impact
45.description: A rape victim is exacting revenge on her aggressors in a small town outside San Francisco. "Dirty" Harry Callahan, on suspension for angering his superiors (again), is assigned to the case.

46.name: Rock & Rule
46.description: A malevolent rock star kidnaps a singer to force her to participate in the summoning of a demon, and her band must help her stop him.

47.name: Cross Creek
47.description: In 1930's Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings moves to Florida's backwaters to write in peace. She feels bothered by affectionate men, editor and confused neighbors, but soon she connects and writes The Yearling, a classic of American literature.

48.name: Mr. Mom
48.description: After he's laid off, a husband switches roles with his wife. She returns to the workforce, and he becomes a stay-at-home dad, a job he has no clue how to do.

49.name: Lone Wolf McQuade
49.description: After helping the local police with some horse thieves, a Texas Ranger aims at a drug lord with arms trade as well. They're interested in the same woman and they're both into martial arts.

50.name: Breathless
50.description: When Jesse Lujack steals a car in Las Vegas and drives down to LA, his criminal ways only escalate- but when will it end?
